com.cloudera.labs.envelope.input

Interface BatchInput

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Component, Input
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FileSystemInput, FIXInput, HiveInput, JdbcInput, KuduInput

    public interface BatchInput
extends Input
    Batch inputs read in a DataFrame from a static external source. Custom inputs that point to a static data source should implement BatchInput.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Dataset<Row> read()
      Read the external source data into the Spark application.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.cloudera.labs.envelope.input.Input

        configure
